Description:
Create Your Very Own Future in Cloverton
This is where the dream begins! Fully-titled, this generous allotment provides the perfect place to build your brand-new home with its uniform proportions, minimal gradient & prime location in the heart of popular Cloverton Estate.
Approximately 392 square metres in total (14m frontage x 28m depth), the block offers all the space required to bring the design of your dreams to reality.
You'll also enjoy the benefits of Cloverton's Green Star development principles ensuring every property is designed and built to a 6-star energy standard - saving on your fuel bills, minimizing your environmental footprint & creating a healthier environment for the entire community.
Adding to its appeal, this premier location will offer immediate access to the best of Cloverton's masterplan amenities including expansive parklands & Merri Creek conservation area, a range of sports facilities, retail & dining precincts, as well as future primary & secondary schools & proposed train station.
An outstanding lifestyle/investment opportunity in the north's thriving growth corridor, it also provides easy access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Titled Land Ready To Build In Kalkallo
Take advantage of this very rare opportunity to secure this block of vacant land approximately 539sqm and NO easements located in one of North's most sought after up and coming locations Kalkallo. This block is titled and ready to build. This block of land offers everything you need. Kalkallo has proposed community centres, state primary and secondary schools, as well as tertiary institutions. Kalkallo is soon be home to a proposed major retail and Metropolitan Activity Centre - catering for everything a growing community needs. Minutes from the existing Donnybrook Train Station and the future Train Station, access to the Melbourne CBD will be quick and easy.
This really is a great opportunity not to be missed!! Buy now before it's too late!!

Description:
Brand New Affordable Home
An amazing opportunity for first home buyers and investors to get into the market with a stylish house in the growing area of Cloverton. Offering a contemporary and functional floor plan, this 3 bedroom home offers a private Master bedroom with WIR and ensuite amenity. A generous laundry is a bonus many new homes lack and it opens up to a comfortable, light filled living area that features a combined lounge, meals and impressive kitchen - featuring stone benches and stainless steel appliances. Security is accommodated via direct garage access, comforted with ducted heating.
Located 30km from the CBD, the Cloverton Estate boasts convenient access to the Donnybrook Train Station, Hume Fwy, Craigieburn Central and many establishing schools, playgrounds, shops and walking tracks for a healthy and fulfilling daily routine.
Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity!

Description:
Titled and Ready to Build!
Large sized rare block of 512 m2 (approx.), perfect for couples and growing families alike is waiting for one lucky buyer to build a dream home of choice.
Residing at Kalkallo, you'll be part of an exclusive community with all of life's amenities at your doorstep, including easy access to the Hume Freeway and close distance to Donnybrook Train Station. Your new home will be a quick stroll to the future Kallkallo Town Centre and planned Primary School and Community Centre. Life is exciting for young families with kids riding their bikes and exploring the fascinating bird life along the thriving Merri Creek wetlands.
Be part of this exciting new community and call it home.
Call us today!
Bhupinder Mata 0433 141 284
Ricky Singh 0415 167 144

Description:
Spacious Elegance with Inviting Ambience
It is our pleasure to present this Brand-New Luxury family home, with a modern welcoming exterior facade set on a corner allotment, that has been purpose-built for easy and functional family living.
The impressive landscaped main entrance will welcome you to a generous space that fills you with a sense of pride.
The carefully considered open plan layout maximises the utility of the living area and creates a home able to meet the needs of a busy and growing family.
Let's not forget to mention the neat and elegantly designed kitchen, ideal for entertaining, with 900mm S/S appliances and 40 mm stone benchtop.
Master bedroom with huge walk in robe and Ensuite with double vanity.
The private and relaxing ambience flows through to the remaining 2 bedrooms, comprising of modern built in robes and shelving for extra storage, providing the same attention to detail for your extra comfort.
Other features include - ducted heating, evaporative cooling, built in robes, waterfall showers, separate powder room, double remote garage, exposed aggregate driveway and wrapped around with colorbond fencing for extra security.

Description:
Prestige Designer Home With Location To Suit
Be welcomed by this impressive classic facade & fastidiously manicured garden & be graced by the homes impressive interior that flaunts a touch of class, style & captivating spaces.
Comprising of 4 bedrooms (colossal master with large his and hers walk-in robe & double vanity en-suite with stone benches), over sized study which makes for the perfect home office, designer equipped kitchen with 40ml stone bench tops, double oven, dishwasher, walk-in pantry & an abundance of storage space overlooking a large family & meals area accompanied by an extravagant alfresco area containing a second kitchen with cooktop, sink, & 40ml stone benches making this the perfect alfresco area to entertain family & friends all year round.
Journey on through the home to a separate formal lounge offering plenty of options for the growing family. Adding to this is a sparkling main bathroom, powder room, roomy laundry with stone benchtops, oversized double remote garage with internal access, high ceilings & doors, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, ducted vacuum, security system, alarm system, an additional outdoor gas point and perfectly manicured gardens.
Add this home to your inspection list as inspections will not disappoint. Set in a tree lined street and located close to Parks & playgrounds, quality sports facilities, primary & secondary schools, as well as retail/cafe precincts highlight the scope of Cloverton's impressive master plan, along with easy access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway.
All this just 40 kilometres from the heart of Melbourne - don't miss this one!

Cloverton set to become Victoria's largest residential development with upcoming school, sports facility and towncentre.

Description:
SOLD in 1 day, more properties needed!
9 HACKNEY WAY, KALKALLO VIC 3064
SOLD by Arvin Singh (0402 713 612) & Kalley Singh (0433 927 573).
ONE GROUP Realty is prsenting a great opportunity to secure this fantastic, well maintained home, offering great value in the popular estate in KALKALLO. Suited perfectly to first home buyers, investors and established families.
Offering Luxurious quality from the moment you enter, the spacious floor plan provides multiple living zones, four bedrooms all with robes, master with en-suite, kids' bedrooms separately zoned, serviced by a central bathroom.
Whether you are entertaining friends or just relaxing with family, you'll appreciate the spacious dimensions and flexibility of a formal lounge partnering with casual living stretching out from the stone detailed kitchen to the alfresco in the easy-care rear yard.
Land Size: 425m2 approx
House Size: 28 sq mts approx
Wide entry with exposed driveway
2700mm high ceiling
Stone bench tops
Chattels: All Fixtures and Fittings as Inspected
Deposit Terms: 5-10% of Purchase Price
Preferred Settlement: 30/60/90 days
Inspection is sure to impress!
Please contact ARVIN SINGH 0402 713 612.

Description:
Location Speaks For Itself..
Perfectly positioned land located in the heart of Cloverton Estate one of Victorias largest master planned communities that will have all your familys needs covered. This wonderful opportunity presents to build your dream home or invest for the future and reap the rewards later. Titled and ready to build on a flat 473ms approx. with no easements. This Estate has a range of features and community services to offer. Current planes for the estate include a primary school, sports facility, parks, and playgrounds and integrated walking trails though the woodlands are just some of the many features of this thriving community.
Proposed plans include the following:
- Major retail and future city centre
- Neighbourhood centre
- Community centre
- Government and civic facilities
- Retirement village
- Public and private primary and secondary schools
- Tertiary education
- Regional parks
- Sporting reserves
- Planned Cloverton train station
- Future childcare centres
Call today before its too late.

Description:
Ready To Build block of Land
Wonderful north facing land approx. 512sqm with 16m frontage and no easements, Located in the beautiful Cloverton Estate in Kalkallo, don't miss this excellent opportunity to build your dream home in a great location.
Titled and ready to build on, only 38 km from the Melbourne CBD. Melbourne's north that will offer your family a world of choice at home and in your surroundings, enjoy access to the best of what Craigieburn and Epping has to offer, with the Hume freeway and donnybrook train station right next door. Cloverton will become a centre of education north of Melbourne - with childcare, schools and tertiary facilities all proposed for the area. A major retail centre is being planned, while public transport and medical services will provide everything the community needs. Cloverton will become home to plenty of fantastic amenities, including schools, shopping, childcare, community centres and beautiful parks with amazing playgrounds. Also with all the Craigieburn facilities only minutes away including shops, schools, parkland and transport this parcel of land could make for the perfect new home site. Buy now before it's too late!!

Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
SOLD FOR $635,00 BY PETAR DJEPAROSKI 0480 120 048
Situated in one of the best pockets this beautiful family residence has it all. Perfect family home in a highly sought after pocket that is sure to leave you breathless!
A free-flowing design exists throughout this luxurious 30 sq 4 bedroom home sitting on spacious 524m2 approx. allotment, offering a contemporary décor boasting both character and finesse. Be greeted by the wide light filled entrance that is graced with quality porcelain floor tiles and be immediately struck by the homes fine quality craftsman ship and attention to every detail.
Commencing the homes footprint encompasses a modern facade led past the master suite with an indulgent ensuite and walk in robe, making your way to the heart of the home, the oversized kitchen like all homes is the centrepiece, draped in white benches with an abundance of food preparational space, quality stainless steel appliances, tiled splashback and timeless cabinetry. Adjoining is the well thought spacious butler's pantry quarters. Meals area flowing on to yet another rumpus room which all overlooks and opens to the outdoor Alfresco entertaining area and impressive rear garden.
Cleverly tucked away, you have a further 3 generous size bedrooms with great sized built in robes and a shared luxurious bathroom. With entertaining in mind, the seamless feel from the internal living and backyard gives you the ultimate indoor-outdoor living experience.
No expense has been spared in both the interior design of the home, and the outdoor living and gardens. There are many unique features peppered throughout, including modern kitchen and bathrooms, stainless steel 900mm upright stove and range hood, gas ducted heating, double remote garage with external and internal access through the family full sized laundry, side access to the luscious gardens with ample space to park your caravan or boat giving you all the privacy in the world plus much, much more...
Look No Further You Have Found Your Family Home!
Land Size: 524sqm
House Size: 30sq
Age of Property: Brand New
Builder: Porter Davis
Hot Water Service: Solar/Gas
Heating: Ducted Heating
Council Rates: $1,500pa approx
Chattels: All fixtures and fittings as inspected
Deposit Terms: 10% of Purchase Price
Preferred Settlement: 30/60 Days
Rental Appraisal: $430 - $450 per week

Description:
A Must-See Modern Luxury!
From front to back, inside and out, everything in this brand-new Glenvill built home, has been done for you. Featuring full turnkey inclusions and premium upgrades, this family home features 4 bedrooms, 2 living areas, alfresco and double remote garage.
- Roller blinds throughout
- Modern kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone benchtops & walk-in pantry
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative cooling
- Mirrored robes
- Solar gas hot water service
- Letterbox, clothesline, fencing, flyscreens and much more
This amazing home is perfect for investors, first home buyers and families and is located in the Cloverton Estate which will become home to plenty of fantastic amenities, including schools, shopping, childcare, community centres and beautiful parks with amazing playgrounds.

Land Size: 392sqm
